channel.title: Commands on My notes and snippets
channel.description: Recent content in Commands on My notes and snippets

item.title: Unix
item.description: Unix awk awk is a complete pattern scanning and processing language, it is most commonly used as a Unix command-line filter to reformat the output of other commands. base64 base64 encode/decode data and print to standard output. bzip2 a block-sorting file compressor. cron daemon to execute scheduled commands. curl
